Package imusim :: Package trajectories :: Module sampled

Source Code for Module imusim.trajectories.sampled

  1  """ 
  2  Classes representing sampled trajectories. 
  3   
  4  Sampled trajectories do not support evaluation of derivative values such as 
  5  velocities or accelerations. To evaulate these properties a splined trajectory 
  6  should be constructed. See L{splined} 
  7  """

 25  from base import PositionTrajectory, RotationTrajectory 
 26  from imusim.maths.quaternions import Quaternion, QuaternionArray 
 27  from imusim.utilities.caching import CacheLastValue 
 28  from imusim.utilities.time_series import TimeSeries 
 29  import imusim.maths.vectors as vectors 
 30  import numpy as np

 32 -class SampledPositionTrajectory(PositionTrajectory): 

 33      """ 
 34      Represents a sampled position trajectory. 
 35   
 36      @ivar positionKeyFrames: A L{TimeSeries} of position key frames. 
 37      """ 
 38   

 39 -    def __init__(self, keyFrames=None): 

 40          """ 
 41          Initialise trajectory. 
 42   
 43          @param keyFrames: A L{TimeSeries} of position key frame samples. 
 44          """ 
 45          self.positionKeyFrames = TimeSeries() if keyFrames is None else keyFrames 

 46   
 47      @CacheLastValue() 

 48 -    def position(self, t): 

 49          if len(self.positionKeyFrames) == 0: 
 50              if np.ndim(t) == 0: 
 51                  return vectors.nan() 
 52              else: 
 53                  return vectors.nan(len(t)) 
 54          else: 
 55              return self.positionKeyFrames(t) 

 56   

 57 -    def velocity(self, t): 

 58          """ 
 59          Not implemented for sampled trajectories. 
 60   
 61          See L{imusim.trajectories.splined} for support. 
 62          """ 
 63          raise NotImplementedError, \ 
 64              "Derivative not available from sampled trajectory. " \ 
 65              + "Create a splined trajectory to obtain derivatives." 

 66   

 67 -    def acceleration(self, t): 

 68          """ 
 69          Not implemented for sampled trajectories. 
 70   
 71          See L{imusim.trajectories.splined} for support. 
 72          """ 
 73          raise NotImplementedError, \ 
 74              "Derivative not available from sampled trajectory. " \ 
 75              + "Create a splined trajectory to obtain derivatives." 

 76   
 77      @property 

 78 -    def startTime(self): 

 79          return self.positionKeyFrames.earliestTime 

 80   
 81      @property 

 82 -    def endTime(self): 

 83          return self.positionKeyFrames.latestTime

100      @CacheLastValue() 

101 -    def rotation(self, t): 

102          if len(self.rotationKeyFrames) == 0: 
103              if np.ndim(t) == 0: 
104                  return Quaternion.nan() 
105              else: 
106                  return QuaternionArray.nan(len(t)) 
107          else: 
108              return self.rotationKeyFrames(t)

138 -class SampledTrajectory(SampledPositionTrajectory, SampledRotationTrajectory): 

139      """ 
140      Represents a sampled position and rotation trajectory. 
141      """ 
142   

143 -    def __init__(self, positionKeyFrames=None, rotationKeyFrames=None): 

144          """ 
145          Initialise trajectory. 
146   
147          @param positionKeyFrames: L{TimeSeries} of position key frames. 
148          @param rotationKeyFrames: L{TimeSeries} of rotation key frames. 
149          """ 
150          SampledPositionTrajectory.__init__(self, positionKeyFrames) 
151          SampledRotationTrajectory.__init__(self, rotationKeyFrames) 

152   
153      @staticmethod 

154 -    def fromArrays(time, position, rotation): 

155          """ 
156          Construct a L{SampledTrajectory} from time, position and rotation arrays. 
157   
158          @param time: sequence of sample times. 
159          @param position: sequence of position samples. 
160          @param rotation: sequence of rotation samples. 
161          """ 
162          return SampledTrajectory( 
163                  TimeSeries(time, position), 
164                  TimeSeries(time, rotation)) 

165   
166      @property 

167 -    def startTime(self): 

168          return max(self.positionKeyFrames.earliestTime, self.rotationKeyFrames.earliestTime) 

169   
170      @property 

171 -    def endTime(self): 

172          return min(self.positionKeyFrames.latestTime, self.rotationKeyFrames.latestTime)
